snippet: The uncle of Kim Jong-un, the North Korean leader, met on Friday in Beijing with President Hu Jintao and Premier Wen Jiabao of China.
abstract: Jang Song-thaek, uncle of and growing crucial adviser to North Korean leader Kim Jong-un, meets with Chinese leaders Pres Hu Jintao and Prime Min Wen Jiabao to discuss economic development; analysts say trip could be prelude to Kim's first visit.
lead_paragraph: The uncle of Kim Jong-un, the North Korean leader, met on Friday in Beijing with President Hu Jintao and Premier Wen Jiabao of China.

headline.seo: Uncle of North Korean Leader in Beijing Meetings
headline.main: North Korean Official Cements Status in Beijing Visit
headline.print_headline: North Korean Official Cements Status in Beijing Visit
